column2: One of the countries in the Holy Roman Empire has gained significantly more prestige than you and has been elected as the new leader of the Holy Roman Empire. You will go back to being a subject of the empire until you regain your former glory.

You have gained a substational amount of prestige in recent years and have clearly surpassed the current leader of the Holy Roman Empire. Because of this, you have been elected the new Leader of the Holy Roman Empire. May you be gracious in your reign.
The Old Leader of the Holy Roman Empire is out.
The Old Leader of the Holy Roman Empire is out.
The Old Leader of the Holy Roman Empire is out.
You can get enough prestige to become the new Holy Roman Empire and replace the old Emporer.
Upon civilizing, you can unify all the mossi nations of Yatenga, Oudraogo, Gurma, and Tenkodogo into one Mossi Empire.
Get Debuffed because you don't matter
You shouldn't be playing this country. It is filler so the game doesn't crash because it needs to assign great powers as civilized.
Upon puppeting, sphereing, or owning all of the Mayan's cores you can claim a unified Mayan state of the Mayan Empire.
The Pope is calling you to a crusade to help liberate Jerusalum from Egypt. It will bring us prestige and glory to help, but we can choose to stay out of the war.
We are being attacked in an attempt to liberate Jerusalum. We can either let the crusaders have the state or give it up.
Upon puppeting, sphereing, or owning all of the Aztec's cores you can claim a unified Aztec state of the Aztec Empire.

We have won the crusades and now it is time to stand as our own country in the world. Our alliance with the many nations of Europe that helped us exist must come to end as we now seek to establish ourselves as an independent nation.

The Crusaders have succeeded! The Country of Judea has been established in the levant, and it is to be a bastion of Catholic religion in the near east. It encompasses many of the lands of Jesus's original travels including Jerusalem and Nazareth. It is still to see if this country will survive among the mostly muslim lands of the near east.
The Crusaders have won and have established the country of Judea as a Catholic state. In encompasses many historically biblical cities like Judea and Nazareth.
The Crusaders have won and have established the country of Judea as a Catholic state.

Through a system of medieval marriages. One of our Catholic allies has lost a monarch today, and because of your alliance with him and the marriages you have with his dyansty, you were chosen to be his successor. Both of your countries are to unite together.
Start a Crusade to retake the land of Judea and declare it a Catholic Kingdom
Through a system of medieval marriages, both the monarch of Portugal and Spain claim the same heir. Thus forming a personal union and uniting the realms.
Bless the King with more Dominions!

Put my cousin on the throne
Invitation from the Holy Roman Empire

The Holy Roman Empire sent us a request asking if we would like to join their empire as a vassal state. It could give us greater security in Europe and allow us to better defend ourselves with alliances.
France has accepted our request to join the Holy Roman Empire and will be integrated into our realm.
France joined the Holy Roman Empire.
France joined the Holy Roman Empire.
France joined the Holy Roman Empire.
France is in a declined state. We can seize the opportunity and invite France to join the Holy Roman Empire, further securing our power in central Europe and expanding our influence westward.
France has declined our request to join the Holy Roman Empire and will remain independent.
The Ottomans, a great empire, have the opportunity to expand. The question comes, which way?
The Ottomans, a great empire, have the opportunity to expand at this time in history.
